about.title: About me
about.introduction: Hey there, I'm Ha! Front-End Developer with an unstoppable passion for turning creative ideas into amazing digital experiences. I absolutely love combining visual creativity with technical problem-solving! From managing 80+ client websites to building interactive web apps and games, every project fuels my enthusiasm for clean, efficient code. What really gets me fired up is seeing complex APIs come to life through intuitive interfaces – it's like digital magic! Ready to create something incredible together? Let's make it happen!
about.locationDescription: I'm based in Güstrow, Germany, and fully open to remote work and relocating for great opportunities!
about.openmindedDescription: I'm constantly exploring new frameworks and technologies – every tool is a chance to create better solutions.
about.problemsolvingDescription: I tackle challenges with analytical thinking and creativity, collaborating with teams to find elegant, efficient solutions.

skills.pdescription: My core expertise lies in JavaScript, Angular, and TypeScript for enterprise-level applications. I've successfully implemented task management systems, integrated PokeAPI for interactive web experiences, and built responsive single-page applications using modern development workflows. I'm passionate about exploring new Angular features, advanced TypeScript patterns, and staying ahead of JavaScript ecosystem updates to deliver cutting-edge solutions.
skills.contactMe: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
skills.specialInterest: I have a special interest in learning

projects.explore: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

01.name: Join
01.longDescription: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

02.name: El Pollo Locco
02.longDescription: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

03.name: Pokédex
03.longDescription: This Pokédex was created using the PokéAPI. You can search for your favorite Pokémon and view all the important information about it.

references.heading: What my colleagues say about me

testimonials.text: Working with Ha was a real pleasure. He consistently demonstrated a keen eye for design and an exceptional attention to detail. His dedication and drive pushed the entire team forward, and he never settled for “good enough” — only considering a task complete when every detail was just right. His commitment and energy made a real difference to the success of our projects.
testimonials.author: Christian Duus - Team Partner

testimonials.text: Ha stood out with his excellent design skills and also showed strong abilities in programming. His creativity and sense of humor brought a great vibe to the team and positively influenced our collaboration. Working with Ha was a great experience.
testimonials.author: Soufiane Nouira - Team Partner

testimonials.text: I had the pleasure of working with Ha Dao on the Kochwelt project, and it was an incredibly enriching experience. Ha Dao brought extensive know-how and expertise to the team, which allowed us to gain many new insights. I especially appreciated his helpful tips, tricks, and valuable advice. Ha Dao consistently worked with reliability and professionalism, making the exchange of information and collaboration on the code an efficient and seamless process. His expertise and dedicated work ethic make him an outstanding team member who enhances any project. Thank you, Ha, for your fantastic support and the inspiring collaboration!
testimonials.author: Jonathan Michutta - Team Partner

testimonials.text: I had the pleasure of working with Ha on a website project. He was very knowledgeable and came up with effective solutions when needed. Ha also ensured that his coding approach was clear to the team by explaining it well. When the team didn't like something he would work with the team to find a solution that pleases everyone.
testimonials.author: Taher Abdel Megid - Team Partner

testimonials.text: As part of a group project, I had the opportunity to work with Ha. In this project, he took responsibility for the design and styling of the application – and did an excellent job. He demonstrated a strong sense of design and user experience. I was particularly impressed by how consistently and professionally he executed the overall visual appearance. Ha not only contributed creative ideas, but also implemented them with clean and thoughtful execution – making a significant contribution to the success of our project. Ha is a dedicated, reliable, and highly skilled team player when it comes to design and visual development.
testimonials.author: Marvin Schneemann - Team Partner

testimonials.text: I really enjoyed working with Ha on the team. I was especially impressed by his structured and solution-oriented approach to programming. Ha not only brings solid technical knowledge but also the ability to quickly analyze complex problems and find creative solutions. Through his open communication and teamwork skills, he significantly contributed to the success of our project. I am confident that Ha’s strengths and dedication will be a great asset to any team in the future
testimonials.author: Mihaela Melania Aghirculesei - Team Partner

contact.title: Contact me
contact.heading: Let's work together
contact.description: I'm actively seeking opportunities where I can contribute my Angular, TypeScript, and JavaScript expertise to create exceptional user experiences that drive business success.
